context_bundle.summary: Token optimization strategies to reduce API costs and improve response times. Includes compression techniques, efficient formatting, and cost-per-task analysis.

onboarding.quick_start: Use abbreviations, remove whitespace, compress examples. Monitor tokens per task. Target: 66% reduction vs baseline verbose prompts.
common_patterns: Use door codes instead of full context
Batch similar queries to amortize context

known_errors.error: High API costs from verbose prompts
known_errors.solution: Apply compression, use PhiSHRI references, batch operations
known_errors.prevention: Monitor token usage per task, set budgets
